verses.verse: מִ֭שְׁלֵי <WH4912> The proverbs שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> of Solomon בֶן־ <WH1121> the son דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David מֶ֝֗לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
לָדַ֣עַת <WH3045> To know חָכְמָ֣ה <WH2451> wisdom וּמוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> and instruction לְ֝הָבִ֗ין <WH995> to perceive אִמְרֵ֥י <WH561> the words בִינָֽה׃ <WH998> of understanding
לָ֭קַחַת <WH3947> To receive מוּסַ֣ר <WH4148> the instruction הַשְׂכֵּ֑ל <WH7919> of wisdom צֶ֥דֶק <WH6664> justice וּ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט <WH4941> and judgment וּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <WH4339> and equity
לָתֵ֣ת <WH5414> To give לִפְתָאיִ֣ם <WH6612> to the simple עָרְמָ֑ה <WH6195> subtilty לְ֝נַ֗עַר <WH5288> to the young man דַּ֣עַת <WH1847> knowledge וּמְזִמָּֽה׃ <WH4209> and discretion

יִשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> [man] will hear חָ֭כָם <WH2450> A wise וְי֣וֹסֶף <WH3254> and will increase לֶ֑קַח <WH3948> learning וְ֝נָב֗וֹן <WH995> and a man of understanding תַּחְבֻּל֥וֹת <WH8458> unto wise counsels יִקְנֶֽה׃ <WH7069> shall attain

לְהָבִ֣ין <WH995> To understand מָ֭שָׁל <WH4912> a proverb וּמְלִיצָ֑ה <WH4426> and the interpretation דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> the words חֲ֝כָמִ֗ים <WH2450> of the wise וְחִידֹתָֽם׃ <WH2420> and their dark sayings

יִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> The fear יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD רֵאשִׁ֣ית <WH7225> [is] the beginning דָּ֑עַת <WH1847> of knowledge חָכְמָ֥ה <WH2451> wisdom וּ֝מוּסָ֗ר <WH4148> and instruction אֱוִילִ֥ים <WH191> [but] fools בָּֽזוּ׃ <WH936> despise פ

שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> hear בְּ֭נִי <WH1121> My son מוּסַ֣ר <WH4148> the instruction אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> of thy father וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֝טֹּ֗שׁ <WH5203> and forsake תּוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> not the law אִמֶּֽךָ׃ <WH517> of thy mother

כִּ֤י ׀ <WH3588> Indeed לִוְיַ֤ת <WH3880> For they [shall be] an ornament חֵ֓ן <WH2580> of grace הֵ֬ם <WH1992> like לְרֹאשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH7218> unto thy head וַ֝עֲנָקִ֗ים <WH6060> and chains לְגַרְגְּרֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1621> about thy neck
בְּנִ֡י <WH1121> My son אִם־ <WH518> if יְפַתּ֥וּךָ <WH6601> entice חַ֝טָּאִ֗ים <WH2400> if sinners אַל־ <WH408> not תֹּבֵֽא׃ <WH14> thee consent

אִם־ <WH518> If יֹאמְרוּ֮ <WH559> If they say לְכָ֪ה <WH1980> Come אִ֫תָּ֥נוּ <WH854> for נֶאֶרְבָ֥ה <WH693> with us let us lay wait לְדָ֑ם <WH1818> for blood נִצְפְּנָ֖ה <WH6845> let us lurk לְנָקִ֣י <WH5355> privily for the innocent חִנָּֽם׃ <WH2600> without cause

נִ֭בְלָעֵם <WH1104> Let us swallow them up כִּשְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> as the grave חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> alive וּ֝תְמִימִ֗ים <WH8549> and whole כְּי֣וֹרְדֵי <WH3381> as those that go down בֽוֹר׃ <WH953> into the pit
כָּל־ <WH3605> all ה֣וֹן <WH1952> substance יָקָ֣ר <WH3368> all precious נִמְצָ֑א <WH4672> We shall find נְמַלֵּ֖א <WH4390> we shall fill בָתֵּ֣ינוּ <WH1004> our houses שָׁלָֽל׃ <WH7998> with spoil

גּ֭וֹרָ֣לְךָ <WH1486> in thy lot תַּפִּ֣יל <WH5307> Cast בְּתוֹכֵ֑נוּ <WH8432> among כִּ֥יס <WH3599> purse אֶ֝חָ֗ד <WH259> us let us all have one יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> have לְכֻלָּֽנוּ׃ <WH3605> shall all

בְּנִ֗י <WH1121> My son אַל־ <WH408> not תֵּלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> walk בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> not thou in the way אִתָּ֑ם <WH854> for מְנַ֥ע <WH4513> with them refrain רַ֝גְלְךָ֗ <WH7272> thy foot מִנְּתִיבָתָֽם׃ <WH5410> from their path
כִּ֣י <WH3588> For רַ֭גְלֵיהֶם <WH7272> For their feet לָרַ֣ע <WH7451> to evil יָר֑וּצוּ <WH7323> run וִֽ֝ימַהֲר֗וּ <WH4116> and make haste לִשְׁפָּךְ־ <WH8210> to shed דָּֽם׃ <WH1818> blood

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Indeed חִ֭נָּם <WH2600> Surely in vain מְזֹרָ֣ה <WH2219> is spread הָרָ֑שֶׁת <WH7568> the net בְּ֝עֵינֵ֗י <WH5869> in the sight כָל־ <WH3605> of any בַּ֥עַל <WH1167> archer כָּנָֽף׃ <WH3671> bird
וְ֭הֵם <WH1992> their own לְדָמָ֣ם <WH1818> for their [own] blood יֶאֱרֹ֑בוּ <WH693> And they lay wait יִ֝צְפְּנ֗וּ <WH6845> they lurk privily לְנַפְשֹׁתָֽם׃ <WH5315> for their [own] lives

כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> So אָ֭רְחוֹת <WH734> So [are] the ways כָּל־ <WH3605> of everyone בֹּ֣צֵֽעַ <WH1214> of every one that is greedy בָּ֑צַע <WH1215> of gain אֶת־ <WH853> נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> the life בְּעָלָ֣יו <WH1167> of the owners יִקָּֽח׃ <WH3947> [which] taketh away פ
חָ֭כְמוֹת <WH2454> Wisdom בַּח֣וּץ <WH2351> without תָּרֹ֑נָּה <WH7442> crieth בָּ֝רְחֹב֗וֹת <WH7339> in the streets תִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> she uttereth קוֹלָֽהּ׃ <WH6963> her voice

בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> in the chief place הֹמִיּ֗וֹת <WH1993> of concourse תִּ֫קְרָ֥א <WH7121> She crieth בְּפִתְחֵ֖י <WH6607> in the openings שְׁעָרִ֥ים <WH8179> of the gates בָּעִ֗יר <WH5892> in the city אֲמָרֶ֥יהָ <WH561> her words תֹאמֵֽר׃ <WH559> she uttereth

עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֣י ׀ <WH4970> How פְּתָיִם֮ <WH6612> How long ye simple ones תְּֽאֵהֲב֫וּ <WH157> will ye love פֶ֥תִי <WH6612> ones וְלֵצִ֗ים <WH3887> ambassador לָ֭צוֹן <WH3944> in their scorning חָמְד֣וּ <WH2530> delight לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> like וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים <WH3684> and fools יִשְׂנְאוּ־ <WH8130> hate דָֽעַת׃ <WH1847> cunning

תָּשׁ֗וּבוּ <WH7725> Turn לְֽת֫וֹכַחְתִּ֥י <WH8433> you at my reproof הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold אַבִּ֣יעָה <WH5042> behold I will pour out לָכֶ֣ם רוּחִ֑י <WH7307> my spirit אוֹדִ֖יעָה <WH3045> unto you I will make known דְבָרַ֣י <WH1697> my words אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Because קָ֭רָאתִי <WH7121> Because I have called וַתְּמָאֵ֑נוּ <WH3985> and ye refused נָטִ֥יתִי <WH5186> I have stretched out יָ֝דִ֗י <WH3027> my hand וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and no מַקְשִֽׁיב׃ <WH7181> and no man regarded
וַתִּפְרְע֥וּ <WH6544> But ye have set at nought כָל־ <WH3605> all עֲצָתִ֑י <WH6098> all my counsel וְ֝תוֹכַחְתִּ֗י <WH8433> none of my reproof לֹ֣א <WH3808> and did not אֲבִיתֶֽם׃ <WH14> and would

גַּם־ <WH1571> will also אֲ֭נִי <WH589> I בְּאֵידְכֶ֣ם <WH343> at your calamity אֶשְׂחָ֑ק <WH7832> I also will laugh אֶ֝לְעַ֗ג <WH3932> I will mock בְּבֹ֣א <WH935> cometh פַחְדְּכֶֽם׃ <WH6343> when your fear

בְּבֹ֤א <WH935> cometh [כְשַׁאֲוָה כ] (כְשֹׁואָ֨ה <WH7584> desolation ק) פַּחְדְּכֶ֗ם <WH6343> When your fear וְֽ֭אֵידְכֶם <WH343> and your destruction כְּסוּפָ֣ה <WH5492> as a whirlwind יֶאֱתֶ֑ה <WH857> cometh בְּבֹ֥א <WH935> cometh עֲ֝לֵיכֶ֗ם <WH5921> When צָרָ֥ה <WH6869> when distress וְצוּקָֽה׃ <WH6695> and anguish

אָ֣ז <WH227> Then יִ֭קְרָאֻנְנִי <WH7121> Then shall they call וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֶֽעֱנֶ֑ה <WH6030> upon me but I will not answer יְ֝שַׁחֲרֻ֗נְנִי <WH7836> they shall seek me early וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> they will not יִמְצָאֻֽנְנִי׃ <WH4672> but they shall not find

תַּ֭חַת <WH8478> Thahash כִּי־ <WH3588> for שָׂ֣נְאוּ <WH8130> For that they hated דָ֑עַת <WH1847> knowledge וְיִרְאַ֥ת <WH3374> the fear יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD לֹ֣א <WH3808> and did not בָחָֽרוּ׃ <WH977> and did not choose
לֹא־ <WH3808> not אָב֥וּ <WH14> They would לַעֲצָתִ֑י <WH6098> none of my counsel נָ֝אֲצ֗וּ <WH5006> they despised כָּל־ <WH3605> all תּוֹכַחְתִּֽי׃ <WH8433> all my reproof

וְֽ֭יֹאכְלוּ <WH398> Therefore shall they eat מִפְּרִ֣י <WH6529> of the fruit דַרְכָּ֑ם <WH1870> of their own way וּֽמִמֹּעֲצֹ֖תֵיהֶ֣ם <WH4156> with their own devices יִשְׂבָּֽעוּ׃ <WH7646> and be filled

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For מְשׁוּבַ֣ת <WH4878> For the turning away פְּתָיִ֣ם <WH6612> of the simple תַּֽהַרְגֵ֑ם <WH2026> shall slay וְשַׁלְוַ֖ת <WH7962> them and the prosperity כְּסִילִ֣ים <WH3684> of fools תְּאַבְּדֵֽם׃ <WH6> shall destroy

וְשֹׁמֵ֣עַֽ <WH8085> But whoso hearkeneth לִ֭י יִשְׁכָּן־ <WH7931> unto me shall dwell בֶּ֑טַח <WH983> safely וְ֝שַׁאֲנַ֗ן <WH7599> and shall be quiet מִפַּ֥חַד <WH6343> from fear רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> of evil פ
